About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

A former dancer, acrobat and massage-therapist became a Frontend Developer. I am open-minded, curious and empathetic. If I am not coding and studying I enjoy beeing in nature with my two dogs Lucy and Wanja.

Web Develoment

Front End Development

The Frontend is where my heart goes. With a good understanding of HTML5 & CSS3 and Javascript I can build from scratch as well as using frameworks like ReactJS or VueJS. I am a problem solver and love to learn new technologies !

Web Design

Wordpress & Webflow & Adobe XD & GIMP

I am teaching myself tools I havent learned at SPICED Academy to improve my skillset to become a Designer who can Code / a Developer who can Design!

Web Dogs

Lucy & Wanja

My buddies who keep me happy and responsible. Two extraordinarily well-behaved sweet pups who would love to sleep under my desk while coding.
